name: Warp Dash (Tess Leiman)
description: Power up and race to the finish in Warp Dash. In the 2-4 player local multiplayer game, you'll take on a super-powered persona and speed, drift, twist, turn, and, most-importantly, dash your way along the course. Every character's dash has unique properties, so you'll need to understand them to get the edge on your opponents. Complete the required laps first to take home the gold.
